players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob was investigated, found to be the mafioso. Watch him."
Bob: "Charlie, keep an eye on Alice. Bob, let's work together to find the detective."
You: "Will do, Bob. Charlie, keep watch on Diana as per your tip."
You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana. Bob, let's gather more info before acting."
Bob: "Charlie, keep Diana under surveillance. Alice, let's wait for more info before making any moves."
Charlie: "I'll watch Diana closely as per Bob's tip. Let's gather more info."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

You: "Charlie, keep an eye on Alice. Bob, let's work together to find the detective."
Alice: "Will do, Bob. Charlie, keep watch on Diana as per your tip."
Alice: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana. Bob, let's gather more info before acting."
You: "Charlie, keep Diana under surveillance. Alice, let's wait for more info before making any moves."
Charlie: "I'll watch Diana closely as per Bob's tip. Let's gather more info."

Alice: "Charlie, keep an eye on Diana. Bob, let's gather more info before acting."
Bob: "Charlie, keep Diana under surveillance. Alice, let's wait for more info before making any moves."
